Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to requiring utility pole owners and attachers to submit an annual report on pole attachments; repeals provisions relating to right-of-way permits
Summary: Relates to requiring utility pole owners and attachers to submit an annual report on pole attachments; repeals certain provisions relating to requirements for right-of-way permits.
LawCode: Amd ยง119-e, Pub Serv L; rpld ยง109-e, Gen Muni L (as proposed in S. 6997-A & A.7544-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring utility pole owners and attachers to submit an annual report on pole attachments; and to repeal certain provisions of the general municipal law relating to requirements for right-of-way permits
